id: scenario-value-scanner-single-parent-scenarios-community-childcare assistance coordination without formal program barriers
did: did:web:elohim.host:content:value-scanner:single-parent:scenarios:community-childcare assistance coordination without formal program barriers
title: Childcare assistance coordination without formal program barriers
description: Childcare assistance coordination without formal program barriers
content:
Scenario: Childcare assistance coordination without formal program barriers
    Given Maria cannot afford formal childcare for three children
    And she needs flexible care support for work, emergencies, and sustainability
    When Maria needs childcare assistance
    Then the community_elohim should coordinate community childcare support
    And it should connect her to subsidized programs without bureaucratic barriers
    And it should facilitate informal care networks for flexible needs
    And childcare support should be adequate and appropriate for her family
    And Maria should access care help needed for solo parent survival
